Package parkeersimulator.model.carpark

Class CustomerGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkeersimulator.framework.Model
      • parkeersimulator.model.carpark.CustomerGroup
  • public class CustomerGroup
extends Model
    Customer group for one specific entry type. Used types: ad hoc and parking pass.
    Version:
    28.01.2019.
